default_position_z.description: The default z-coordinate in meters of the position of radar objects in the case the radar does not provide it.

default_velocity_z.description: The default z-coordinate in meters per second of the velocity of radar objects in the case the radar does not provide it.

default_acceleration_z.description: The default z-coordinate in meters per squared second of the acceleration of radar objects in the case the radar does not provide it.

default_size_x.description: The default x-coordinate in meters of the size of radar objects in the case the radar does not provide it.

default_size_y.description: The default y-coordinate in meters of the size of radar objects in the case the radar does not provide it.

default_size_z.description: The default z-coordinate in meters of the size of radar objects in the case the radar does not provide it.

classification_remap.description: Mapping from RADAR labels (autoware_sensing_msgs::msg::RadarClassification) to Perception labels (autoware_perception_msgs::msg::ObjectClassification).

MOTORCYCLE.description: Radar tends to misclassify far cars as MOTORCYCLE; default=CAR

BICYCLE.description: Radar tends to misclassify far cars as BICYCLE; default=CAR

HAZARD.description: HAZARD is not a valid Perception label; fallback=UNKNOWN
